item.title: SharePoint migration paths
item.description:
SharePoint migration paths

Most people are eager to update to the latest version of their favourite app, but it's just not possible to press an 'update' button with SharePoint. The wise intranet manager will have a certain amount of trepidation as they embark along the SharePoint migration path.

item.title: How to spot your intranet is on its last legs
item.description:
How to spot your intranet is on its last legs

You mean to get the maximum value from your ageing intranet and try to 'sweat the asset', but everything is slowing down and whole sections of the company ignore the intranet. At some point, you have to admit that the system is on its last legs.
